attributes.action: Move facilities that manufacture Covid vaccines back to the UK
attributes.additional_details: Bring all manufacturing of Covid vaccines back to the UK to reduce the dependency on Europe for our Covid vaccines and prevent the UK from being held hostage by Europe.
attributes.background: Invest in facilities that manufacture Covid vaccines in the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you would like to see more of the Covid-19 vaccine being manufactured in the UK but it is unclear what you mean by 'bringing back' manufacturing facilities to the UK as none of the existing facilities have closed and moved to EU sites.

In any case the UK Government already has plans to increase its vaccine manufacturing capacity. You can read more about the plans and what has already been done here:
https://post.parliament.uk/manufacturing-covid-19-vaccines/
